subject: Boxing
Marijuana
Television
lead_paragraph: Nevada boxing regulators have ordered Floyd Mayweather Jr. to appear before them next week to answer questions about scenes from a Showtime network show before his fight Saturday against Marcos Maidana.
snippet: Nevada boxing regulators have ordered Floyd Mayweather Jr. to appear before them next week to answer questions about scenes from a Showtime network show before his fight Saturday against Marcos Maidana.
